TopicTitle: Docking With Stock Parts to My Space Station!

Articles.Content:
In my latest video of my Kerbal Space Program LP I dock with my space station and test out using my latest editing software!

Would you please be so kind as to watch, like, comment and subscribe? It would mean the world to me!
Could you please add the link to the video, so i could watch it on a mobile device.

Yes, sorry about that but for my last two videos mobile viewing can not be turned on sadly as my intro has copyrights by AMG or some company where they said you can use the music freely yet they later tell me that I can not allow the video to be viewed on mobile devices.
I am now disputing WMG's claim about their recording in my video as it is not their recording and my recording does not have any copyright in it.
